CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 25, 1959, pg. 3, reads: "Playing it Cool - While many adults are unable to do anything about the heat, except mumble and grumble, sisters Cheryl Ann (front) and Crystal Harris of 7604 Mulford St., and their playmate, Gail Baldwin, play it cool by crowding into this old-fashioned tub filled with water and having a splashing - good time. Think you could fit into this tub?  Then suffer! - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Cheryl "Tiny" Harris standing behind Crystal Harris holding Gail Baldwin in washtub, on sidewalk
